responsibilities: Participate as a member of the Testing team, including leading large Testing teams.
Plan and execute the analysis of the testing requirements of a project to define and write a Testing Strategy and Test Plans.
Prepare estimates for the level of effort for large testing projects, including the number of resources and duration of time needed to complete the project, and provide input to the master schedule.
Represent testing as a leader within the internal and client-facing leadership teams.
Provide burndowns, metrics, and status reporting for project testing to the leadership team on a daily/weekly basis.
Conduct daily stand-up meetings with test leads and testers to provide direction and review status.
Mentor test leads and test team members as needed to comply with testing standards and provide guidance on testing issues and questions.
skills: Understanding of requirement and design specifications
Proficiency in testing processes and tools
Ability to execute test cases and scripts
Ability to analyze test results and report on testing progress and results
Facilitate defect resolution and document final test results
Ability to create testing metrics and report on testing-related aspects of the project
qualifications: 10 or more years of experience in leading and delivering large-scale testing efforts
Exceptional in leading/managing System Integration Testing and User Acceptance Testing
Exceptional in understanding requirement, design specifications, testing strategy; testing analysis and design, and functional test specifications

Exceptional in testing processes and tools to execute test cases and scripts, analyze test results, report on testing progress and results, facilitate defect resolution, and document final test results
